title: A Country Christmas
description: Country girl Charlotte Bass fell for the sophisticated ways of Shaun Matheson, hoping to become his wife. But he abruptly returned to Boston and his rich city-girl fiance. Now Shaun has come back to Peacham, Vermont, and Charlotte is engaged to another man. Shaun can't explain why he left, but he can't let her marry a boor who doesn't deserve her. Will a Christmas miracle stop her?
author: Elizabeth Doyle
